attributes.description:
The Honda Ballade is a comfortable sedan built by Honda of Japan. The legacy of the Ballade began in 1980 and to date is still one of the most reliable, fuel efficient and comfortable sedans available. This particular Honda Ballade is a one owner vehicle from new. It is the 1.5 Elegance spec which means it is fully loaded with factory extras like ABS, Airbags, Aircon, Electric windows, Electric mirrors, Power steering, Central locking, Multi-functional steering wheel, 2 tone interior, Alloy wheels, Front loader radio with AUX and USB input, Cruise control, Hands-free phone system, a service history and spare key.

For more information, contact 083 509 1700 or 072 824 2534
